body:
While reading the documentation I stumbled across the following in the `build_settings.rst`:

```yaml
   packages:
     openmpi:
       paths:
         openmpi@1.4.3%gcc@4.4.7 arch=linux-x86_64-debian7: /opt/openmpi-1.4.3
```

The existing examples on that page swapped architecture and operating system for the `arch=`. I believe it should appear as `arch=linux-debian7-x86_64`?
title: Update target arch in build settings documentation examples
